original: @131a * // rgya gar skad du //
analyzed: @131a * // rgya gar skad du //
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: sa m'a dhi buddha bi sha g'a ta bo dhi d'i pam n'a ma /
analyzed: sa m'a dhi buddha bi sha g'a ta bo dhi d'i pam n'a ma /
translated: Samadhibuddhavishagata-bodhidipana-nama

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bsam gtan gyi dug sel bar byed pa'i mar me zhes bya ba /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bsam gtan gyi dug sel bar byed pa'i mar me zhes bya ba /
translated: The Lamp of the Enlightenment that Removes the Poison of Meditation on Buddhahood

original: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //üîΩgang gis dam pa'i zhabs kyi padmo la //
analyzed: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo // gang gis dam pa'i zhabs kyi padmo la //
translated: Homage to Manjushri, the great wisdom being.üîΩBy whom, for a long time, the powerful lotus feet of the sublime

original: yun ring btud pa'i mthu ni gzi brjid ldan //
analyzed: yun ring btud pa'i mthu ni gzi brjid ldan //
translated: one have been bowed to with great splendor,

original: gang zhig rgyud la btsan thabs 'jug byad pa //
analyzed: gang zhig rgyud la btsan thabs 'jug byad pa //
translated: who enters the mindstream suddenly,üîΩwithout the eye of wisdom, wanders in the abyss.

original: shes rab mig dang mi ldan nyam ngar rgyug / gdung ba gcod byed rgyu ni sems pa'i shes rab ste //
analyzed: shes rab mig dang mi ldan nyam ngar rgyug / gdung ba gcod byed rgyu ni sems pa'i shes rab ste //
translated: The cause that cuts off torment is the wisdom of intention,

original: thams cad theg chen lam du 'jug pa'i rigs //
analyzed: thams cad theg chen lam du 'jug pa'i rigs //
translated: all should enter the path of the Mahayana.

original: rab tu byed pa'i lam du ma zhugs pa'i /
analyzed: rab tu byed pa'i lam du ma zhugs pa'i /
translated: Those who have not entered the path of composition,

original: // / bsam gtan pa ni nags klung bung ba bzhin //
analyzed: // / bsam gtan pa ni nags klung bung ba bzhin //
translated: the meditators are like bees in the forest.

original: rig pa'i gnas lnga rgal te tshar gcod gang //
analyzed: rig pa'i gnas lnga rgal te tshar gcod gang //
translated: Those who have crossed over the five sciences and are victorious,

original: gzhung lugs mi ldan pas ni don ma rnyed //
analyzed: gzhung lugs mi ldan pas ni don ma rnyed //
translated: without the scriptural tradition, the meaning is not found.

original: tshogs rgyas pa yis rab tu nga rgyal ba //
analyzed: tshogs rgyas pa yis rab tu nga rgyal ba //
translated: And the pride of the extensive accumulation.

original: rgyal po'i sgo ba bzhin du bde blag bral //
analyzed: rgyal po'i sgo ba bzhin du bde blag bral //
translated: Like a king‚Äôs gatekeeper, you are free from ease.

original: ye shes drug gi yul la ma zhugs na //
analyzed: ye shes drug gi yul la ma zhugs na //
translated: If you do not enter the domain of the six pristine consciousnesses,

original: yid ni ngang tshul ngan pas rgya cher min //
analyzed: yid ni ngang tshul ngan pas rgya cher min //
translated: The mind is not vast due to bad behavior.

original: rtogs dang nyams su myong ba'i mtha' bral bas //
analyzed: rtogs dang nyams su myong ba'i mtha' bral bas //
translated: Since the limit of realization and experience is free,

original: brten dang goms pa ma rnyed ta la 'dra //
analyzed: brten dang goms pa ma rnyed ta la 'dra //
translated: The support and familiarity are not found, like a tƒÅla tree.

original: chos rnams rnam par dag pa'i ye shes ni //
analyzed: chos rnams rnam par dag pa'i ye shes ni //
translated: The pristine consciousness of the pure dharmas

original: gsar la rtsis bsgyur rgyan du byas pa bzhin //
analyzed: gsar la rtsis bsgyur rgyan du byas pa bzhin //
translated: Is like a new calculation made into an ornament.

original: gang zhig 'brel med ting 'dzin gang bsgom pa //
analyzed: gang zhig 'brel med ting 'dzin gang bsgom pa //
translated: Whoever meditates on a samƒÅdhi that is not related

original: thams cad mkhyen par mi rung sangs rgyas min //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen par mi rung sangs rgyas min //
translated: Is not suitable for omniscience and is not a buddha.üîΩIf one abides in the stage of creation, the stage of completion is supreme;

original: bskyed pa'i rim la gnas na rdzogs rim mchog / de yang snying po sbyangs nas gcig 'gyur ba //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim la gnas na rdzogs rim mchog / de yang snying po sbyangs nas gcig 'gyur ba //
translated: Further, having refined the essence, it becomes one.

original: rnam pa'i mchog dang ldan pa'i bde chen de //
analyzed: rnam pa'i mchog dang ldan pa'i bde chen de //
translated: That great bliss endowed with the supreme aspect

original: yid bzhin nor bu gtsug tu btags pa bzhin //
analyzed: yid bzhin nor bu gtsug tu btags pa bzhin //
translated: Is like a wish-fulfilling jewel placed on the crown.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa gces spras mdzod 'dzin na //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa gces spras mdzod 'dzin na //
translated: If one cherishes and holds the stage of creation,

original: lha yi bag chags nyid kyis grol mi 'gyur //
analyzed: lha yi bag chags nyid kyis grol mi 'gyur //
translated: And the latent tendencies of the gods will not bring about liberation.

original: de bzhin nang dang zab mo'ang de yin te //
analyzed: de bzhin nang dang zab mo'ang de yin te //
translated: The same is true of the inner and the profound.

original: glang chen mig srung zug rngur gyur pa bzhin //
analyzed: glang chen mig srung zug rngur gyur pa bzhin //
translated: Like an elephant with a thorn in its foot,

original: ldog pa gcod la chos rnams brgyad khrir bden //
analyzed: ldog pa gcod la chos rnams brgyad khrir bden //
translated: The eighty-four thousand dharmas are true for the sake of elimination.

original: de phyir rigs dang ye shes bde gshegs gsung //
analyzed: de phyir rigs dang ye shes bde gshegs gsung //
translated: Therefore, the Sugata taught the families and the wisdoms.

original: rang bzhin shes na gar yang bde ba med //
analyzed: rang bzhin shes na gar yang bde ba med //
translated: If you know the nature, there is no happiness anywhere.

original: mi bden med phyir kun mkhyen tshig gis dbul //
analyzed: mi bden med phyir kun mkhyen tshig gis dbul //
translated: Because there is no unreality, the Omniscient One‚Äôs words are poor.

original: de ltar bya ba'i rim pa zhes pa ni //
analyzed: de ltar bya ba'i rim pa zhes pa ni //
translated: Thus, what is called the process of action

original: ka shi wa rnams mu tig rnyed pa bzhin //
analyzed: ka shi wa rnams mu tig rnyed pa bzhin //
translated: Is like the Kashmiri finding a pearl.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad bde ba che la gnas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad bde ba che la gnas //
translated: All the buddhas abide in great bliss.

original: go cig 'dres shing 'dus pas mnyam pa nyid //
analyzed: go cig 'dres shing 'dus pas mnyam pa nyid //
translated: The one is mixed and gathered in the same way.

original: gcig la bstod pas thams cad bstod 'gyur ba //
analyzed: gcig la bstod pas thams cad bstod 'gyur ba //
translated: By praising one, all are praised.

original: ye shes sems dpa' brjod pa thugs mthun yin //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' brjod pa thugs mthun yin //
translated: The wisdom being is said to be in accord with the mind.

original: 'khor dang myang @131b 'das chos su ci snang dang // sna tshogs 'bru dang sna tshogs byed pa dang // so so'i rgyud la bden par snang mod kyang //
analyzed: 'khor dang myang @131b 'das chos su ci snang dang // sna tshogs 'bru dang sna tshogs byed pa dang // so so'i rgyud la bden par snang mod kyang //
translated: And the individual continuums appearing as true,

original: ye shes sems dpa'i sprul pa nor bu bzhin //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa'i sprul pa nor bu bzhin //
translated: Are the emanations of the j√±ƒÅnasattva, like a jewel.

original: 'od kyang kun rdzob tsam du thams cad yod //
analyzed: 'od kyang kun rdzob tsam du thams cad yod //
translated: The light also exists as mere relative reality.

original: gsung dag pa la brten nas 'phags pa mthong //
analyzed: gsung dag pa la brten nas 'phags pa mthong //
translated: The ƒÅryas see the pure voice.

original: yid 'ong de ni dge ba'i las las byung //
analyzed: yid 'ong de ni dge ba'i las las byung //
translated: That which is pleasing arises from virtuous karma.

original: sdug bsngal mi bsten phyir na spang bas bya //üîΩde phyir gsang sngags rten 'brel 'byung ba yi //
analyzed: sdug bsngal mi bsten phyir na spang bas bya // de phyir gsang sngags rten 'brel 'byung ba yi //
translated: Since suffering is not to be relied upon, it is abandoned.üîΩTherefore, the precious tantra is the abode of the ocean

original: man ngag rgya mtsho'i gnas ni rin chen brgyud //
analyzed: man ngag rgya mtsho'i gnas ni rin chen brgyud //
translated: Of the intimate instructions of the dependent origination of secret mantra.

original: 'di las 'byung bzhin rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis //
analyzed: 'di las 'byung bzhin rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis //
translated: The yogis and yoginƒ´s should proceed

original: skas kyi rim pa bzhin du rim par bgrod //
analyzed: skas kyi rim pa bzhin du rim par bgrod //
translated: In stages, like the rungs of a ladder.

original: ma rig dang bcas shes pa 'di yis ni//üîΩgo bar mi rigs zhen pa'i mthu las byung //
analyzed: ma rig dang bcas shes pa 'di yis ni// go bar mi rigs zhen pa'i mthu las byung //
translated: This consciousness that possesses ignoranceüîΩIs not reasonable to understand because it arises from the power of clinging.

original: mi gnas snying po rgyud las skyes pas na //
analyzed: mi gnas snying po rgyud las skyes pas na //
translated: Since it arises from the tantra of the nonabiding essence,

original: 'khrul par mi rigs gdod ma'i mthu las byung //
analyzed: 'khrul par mi rigs gdod ma'i mthu las byung //
translated: It is illogical to be deluded, for it arises from the primordial power.

original: rang bzhin rtag cing mi 'gyur rtag pa nyid //
analyzed: rang bzhin rtag cing mi 'gyur rtag pa nyid //
translated: The nature is permanent and unchanging.

original: dri ldan nges shes rang rig rgyud las byung //
analyzed: dri ldan nges shes rang rig rgyud las byung //
translated: The certainty of the scent arises from the continuum of self-awareness.

original: rang bzhin rgyud la ji ltar yang gnas pa //
analyzed: rang bzhin rgyud la ji ltar yang gnas pa //
translated: The nature exists in the continuum in any way at all.

original: bsam par mi nus aa ma ngo mtshar che //üîΩsangs rgyas kyi byang chub bsam gtan gyi dug sel ba'i mar me zhes bya ba //üîΩrgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: bsam par mi nus aa ma ngo mtshar che // sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bsam gtan gyi dug sel ba'i mar me zhes bya ba // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: It is inconceivable. Ah! How marvelous!üîΩThe Lamp That Dispels the Darkness of the Meditative ConcentrationsüîΩThe Lamp That Dispels the Darkness of the Meditative Concentrations, the Enlightenment of the Buddha, composed by the Indian master ≈örƒ´ Nondual Vajra, is complete.

analyzed: // / rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradzny'a shr'i dzny'a na k'irtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o /
